document_data.name: Houses of Morning
document_data.mainbody: The '''Houses of Morning''' were not one but three temples to [[Lathander]] in the city of [[Loudwater]] in the [[Delimbiyr Vale]] in the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Location: The temples stood in different parts of the city, with one in the west, another in the east, and the third in the center. This last one was in High Town, on top of Loudwater Crag and near [[High Lord's Hall]].
document_data.Staff: The high priest of the Houses of Morning was Prior [[Athosar (Loudwater)|Athosar]].
document_data.Services: Prior Athosar provided healing and resurrection magic such as ''[[raise dead]]'', albeit for an appropriate fee.<ref><ref><ref> He could also remove corruption in a consecrated space<ref> and cure those afflicted with [[lycanthropy]], at no cost.<ref>
